sub_title: Teacher of Italian, Dutch and English
summary: Experienced and passionate teacher of Italian, Dutch and English as a second language to adults. In possession of different qualifications -Celta, Filim - and an ongoing curiosity for all aspects of learning and teaching. Knowledgeable and with a long experience in higher and business education as well as general teaching.
